attributes.title: I go to the same tanning salon as trump

attributes.review: By far the worst app I have ever seen. Deplorable, absolutely a disgrace.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: For the trump supporters 😌, this app took sooo long to download😡to be specific it took 1 week to download. like WHAT IS THAT. If I could rate it below 1, I would but I can’t to sad 😔, when I got into the app it literally took ALL of my iNFo then my fan started to turn off and on by it self also my sister started acting she said “ TRUMP 2020” bih when I heard I came to her and said heck no your not and she learned her lesson 😌
attributes.title: For✨in🙈her🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: So first I thought this app was gonna make me better at eating but come to find out it makes my Popeyes chicken stale 🤦🏾‍♂️ then my pet aligator died bc it didnt have gills but on app it says “your aligator will have gills !” But then I looked at my pet aligator and it didn’t have gills🤦🏾‍♂️ so yeah that’s why you should rate this app a 1 star
attributes.title: Renegade 🤢

attributes.review: Now I have been a Trump supporter since the 2016 election and I loved my president. Unfortunately, I cannot say i love this app. It made my phone crash. The next day my bank called me asking about huge withdrawals and purchases made all across the country. The worst part is that money was meant to go towards my beautiful little princess Haleigh for her pageants this year. Looking in her darling little face n telling her she’d have to wear last years dress broke both of our hearts 😢. Love my country, Love my president, Hate this app.
attributes.title: My poor baby

attributes.review: This app is the worse and has no purpose so there for it should be deleted.
attributes.title: Delete please

attributes.review: No good :( was I had low expectations but WOW
attributes.title: This is a bad app

attributes.review: This app flared up my IBS (google it if you must) during my annual summer cult meeting. The cloaks were on and the BOOM thunder rumbles in down under if you know what I mean :(. So I walk to the bathroom but the line in all the way across the street. Long story short this APP BROWNED MY CLOAK. I WANT A REFUND!!!
attributes.title: Exhausted and smelly

attributes.review: And even worst so called president.
attributes.title: Bad app
